summary: dylan ramsey is a restaurant owner looking for the girl of his dreams .  his new neighbors ,  lila dubois is a french cellist pursuing a spot in the l . a .  philharmonic whose pushy ex - fiancée ,  rene ,  shows up to win her back .  dylan can handle the ex - fiancée ,  it ' s his four - legged competition that has him stumped .  so he does what any man desperate for a date would do .  .  .  kidnaps her beloved pooch ,  jack ,  volunteers to help his distraught owner with the search and plans to produce the lost doggie in time to reap the gratitude  ( and a date ?  )  from lila .  but things start to misfire when the dog eats an anniversary ring dylan was given to hold by his restaurant partner and a jealous rene figures out dylan has kidnapped the dog .
